about_the_game:
This is a very interesting VR leisure game. The game takes you through time and space from the first person perspective. In this virtual forest, you will wield the ball racket with the dinosaurs to experience the fun of table tennis.



After entering the game, you will see yourself standing on a grass, surrounded by a dense forest. You will find that the air here is very fresh, as if you can smell the fragrance of the forest. You can explore at will and feel the wonderful and wonderfulness of nature. At the same time, you will also see a huge dinosaur standing opposite you, ready to play a table tennis game with you.



In the game, you can control the racket by waving the handle in your hand, grasp the direction and speed of the ball, and try to play the control range of the opponent and get the score. Win the first party to get 7 points.
The table tennis game in the game is very realistic, and the bounce effect and sound effect of the ball are very real, allowing you to be completely immersed in the game. And VR technology also allows you to observe the scene at 360 degrees and enjoy the real game experience.



In short, this is a very interesting VR casual game, which not only allows you to relax your body and mind, experience the real table tennis game in the virtual world, but also play with the dinosaurs to feel the beauty and wonder of nature. If you want to experience such a novelty, come and join our ranks!

Operation method:

Adjust the height handle up/down key
Reset the position handle grip key
Passing the handle pause key

name: VR Dinosaur Pingpong

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: Steam VR

short_description: This is a very interesting VR leisure game. The game takes you through time and space from the first person perspective. In this virtual forest, you will wield the ball racket with the dinosaurs to experience the fun of table tennis.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
